name: Fight For Control!
description:
Fight For Control! is a single-player adventure-style game, where you are fighting for control of your character in a procedural generated level. The gameplay is simple; the objective is to defeat all the enemies in the game without dying by using a sword and a bow. Over time, your controls will begin to be taken over by an AI, and you have to fight or cooperate with the AI to successfully beat the game. (There is also a chance that you will take controls back from the AI)

Controls:

WASD - Movement

N - Shoot your Bow

M - Swing your Sword

UI:

Health Bar - The top most bar represents your player's health

Insanity Meter - The bottom bar (purple/green) represents the chances of your controls being taken over by the AI

Credits:

Nathan Glick & David Liu - Developers

"Ansimuz" - Tiny RPG Forest assets from the Unity Store
